issue.title: spicychat.ai

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [http://spicychat.ai](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fspicychat.ai) ### Comment > Account required to reproduce steps. Go to any character and send a message. The website will send the entire user conversation to "server.megabrain.co" to process for 'contextual ads', and then displays an ad in the chat. Restored article, update available in about 3-4 hours.
Did not see an ad text after removing rule. If ad text is shown again, this rule may help:

heise.de##body > div.a-layout:has(> div.a-layout__container > div.a-layout__item > div[class^="ad-"]):not(:has(article))

pull_request.title: Bump @adguard/aglint from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3
pull_request.body:
Bumps [@adguard/aglint](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AGLint) from 2.1.2 to 2.1.3.
Release notes

Sourced from @​adguard/aglint's releases.

v2.1.3

See CHANGELOG.md for the list of changes.

Changelog

Sourced from @​adguard/aglint's changelog.

2.1.3 - 2024-12-19

Added

  • Support for ABP CSS injections #224.

Changed

  • Updated [@​adguard/agtree] to v2.3.0.

#224: AdguardTeam/AGLint#224

Commits
  • c5e1510 skipci: Automatic increment build number
  • 31ccf5c AG-37637 Adding support for ABP CSS injections. #224
  • See full diff in compare view

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://dependabot-badges.githubapp.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=@adguard/aglint&package-manager=npm_and_yarn&previous-version=2.1.2&new-version=2.1.3)](https://docs.github.com/en/github/managing-security-vulnerabilities/about-dependabot-security-updates#about-compatibility-scores) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge and block automerging - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot close` will close this PR and stop Dependabot recreating it. You can achieve the same result by closing it manually - `@dependabot show ignore conditions` will show all of the ignore conditions of the specified dependency - `@dependabot ignore this major version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this minor version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself)

issue.title: Consider removing the "Icelandic ABP List" filter from filters registry
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [X] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [X] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

The Icelandic ABP List has not been updated since 2022. Most rules in this filter are likely to be outdated.


### Proposed solution

Please check the rules and consider removing the filter from filters registry. 

### Additional information

_No response_

labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180545) if other issue.

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock professional company.
Ad-Shield receives up to 700 000 000 KRW per 2 year from tech foundation support program of South Korean government.

These records can be verified at [here](https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues?q=label%3Aad-shield+).
You can check the fact that support of South Korean government at [here](https://www.venturesquare.net/857777).

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [microShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://community.list-kr.com/docs/AdGuard/Userscripts/microShield.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/microShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/180545) if other issue.

Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).

issue.title: m.winfuture.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

issue.title: m.winfuture.de

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).
Please report to [here](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/175394) if other issue.

comment.body:
It should overwrites value only if Admiral script is not blocked, and if it's not blocked we don't need this rule.
As I recall it was added to fix video player when Admiral script was blocked.
As far as I can see, when `DOMContentLoaded` is used then then required part of the script is executed too late.

issue.title: Get rid of JS rules

labels.name: Infrastructure
labels.description: Related to the repository infrastructure

comment.body:
These rules should work without adding `document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded'`.
The rule from https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/de017d116be72ec7dbc2e321558be1d27adb8194 is probably obsolete and not required (I see that it's overwritten by website but I don't see any breakage, so probably can be just removed).

The old rule from - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/b83c346a093e54f4903729f686e9aa66f2589ee4 still works (video ads are also blocked by other rules) and it should not be converted to `DOMContentLoaded` because it causes that it doesn't work at all.

The rule for `cbssports.com` (https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/commit/8b257f594a6db9eba96ba820d0b4cdfdeb931d71#diff-97c06fd34ce664c89282de03aed72f65fcd6faec4a63ca56052ac7bbb3467e13R233) is also probably obsolete, and if not, it should not be changed (it's not overwritten by website on my end).

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: T: Anti Adblock Script
labels.description: The site detects ad blocking

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/187851
